title: Video about "A fierce warrior with sleek black fur and glowing green eyes, sprinting through a misty forest. The cat wears light armor and has battle scars. It chases shadowy enemy figures between trees, leaping over roots and dodging obstacles. Cinematic camera angles, intense music, and fast-paced action. 15-second dramatic scene."
